snippet.title: Northbury Grove | Release Trailer (80s edition)
snippet.description:
NorthBury Grove is a first person horror / survival game inspired by cult classic movies from the '70s and '80s. It is set within Jon of the Shred's "Scythe Saga Universe."

Play as Connor as he searches for his missing friend Grace Bailey. Will you find her? Or will you find yourself lost in the woods as a killer lurks?

Use stealth as your weapon, hide from the killer, never get caught, and most importantly - SURVIVE!

https://twitter.com/dev_scythe
